body: Lyrify is a music streaming & lyrics website both in One.
While listening to music Lyrify gets you the Lyrics of the Song you are listening to so you understand the song on a Deeper level.
Simply search for the song on the search tab and Lyrify will get you the song,and the lyrics of the song will show up on your Screen in Lyrics tab.

header: What can I Listen on Lyrify?
body: You can listen to all the Top 100 and famous songs from your favorite artists or from your hidden gems and personal Discoveries .
